title: Thooliyilae Lyrics Chinna Thambi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
thooliyilae aada vandha
vaanathu min vilakkae
aaliyilae kandeduththa
arputha aani muththae

thottil melae
muththu maala
vanna poovaa vilaiyaada
chinna thambi esappaada

thooliyilae aada vandha
vaanathu min vilakkae
aaliyilae kandeduththa
arputha aani muththae

paatteduthu naan padichchaa
paattaruvi kannurangum
patta maram poo malarum
paarayilum neer surakkum

raagam enna thaalam enna
arinjaa naan padichen
aezhu katta ettu katta
therinja naan padichaen

naan padachcha niyanamellaam
yaar koduththaa saamithaan
aededuthu padichadhilla
saatchi indha boomi thaan

thottil melae
muththu maala
vanna poovaa vilaiyaada
chinna thambi esappaada

soru poda thaayirukkaa
pattiniya paaththa dhilla
thaai irukkum kaaranathaal
koyilum ponadhilla

thaai adichi valichchadhilla
irundhum naan azhuven
naan azhudhaa thaangiduma
udanae thaai azhuvaa

aaga moththam thaai manasu
pol nadakkum pilla thaan
vaalugira vazhkayila
tholvigalae illathaan

thottil melae
muththu maala
vanna poovaa vilaiyaada
chinna thambi esappaada

thooliyilae aada vandha
vaanathu min vilakkae
aaliyilae kandeduththa
arputha aani muththae

thottil melae
muththu maala
vanna poovaa vilaiyaada
chinna thambi esappaada
